faqs.title: What is Club Gamma ?
faqs.description: Club Gamma is a community run by enthusiastic students. We try to engage the students through our events like Workshops, Seminars, Hackathons etc.

faqs.title: Do I need to be very good at coding to be a part of Club Gamma ?
faqs.description: No, We at Club Gamma believe diverse culture of the community. Club Gamma is open to any student, ranging from newbie programmers to experts in industry and other academic disciplines.

faqs.title: What if my questions are not answered in FAQ's section ?
faqs.description: You can always contact on our social media handles, we are happy to solve your doubts :)
